_source.text: 7. The authors, being uninvolved in Greek education and obviously having a distaste for the hesychastic tradition, consider that they share understand the teaching of St. Gregory Palamas better than the Righteous Elder Kallinikos the Hesychast who harshly criticized the heresy and provoked the synodal condemnation of the Name-Worshippers.
